content.text:
# List of Golden Globe Awards received by Netflix

{| class="infobox" style="width: 25em; text-align: left; font-size: 90%; vertical-align: middle;"
|+ List of awards won by Netflix
| style="text-align:center;" colspan="3"| Total number of wins and nominations
|-
|
| colspan="2" width=50
|-
|
| colspan="2" width=50
|- style="background:#d9e8ff;"
| colspan="3" style="font-size: smaller; text-align:center;"| References
|}
Netflix has received multiple Golden Globe Award wins and nominations since 2014.
Film
, 2019 winner for Roma]]
, 2022 winner for The Power of the Dog]]
, 2021 winner for The Trial of the Chicago 7]]
, 2020 nominee for Marriage Story]]
, 2021 nominee for Mank]]
, 2020 nominee for The Irishman]]
